According to the Bloomberg story, by reporter Dina Bass, Steve Ballmer plans to extend a management shake-up aimed at adding senior product executives with an engineering background. Bass is a veteran reporter who has covered Microsoft for many years, and she typically has impeccable sourcing. Her report is believable. The questions: Why? Why now? The two answers are intertwined

Denver set a franchise record for most points in a regulation game and fell just 16 points shy of the franchise record for points in a game. There was no way that I couldn't enjoy the game, not from the way we played offensively, Nuggets coach George Karl said. The Nuggets had eight players score in double figures, led by Carmelo Anthony 's 26 and Allen Iverson 's 24. He is often parodied in pop culture, and was described by the The Times journalist Minette Marrin as representing, along with his fellow judges on Britain's Got Talent, the heartless, thoughtless and superficial the flotsam and jetsam of the polluted seas of celebrity that is likely to sink without trace into toxic foam . Simon Cowell is known for combining activities in the television and music industries, having promoted singles and records for various artists, including television personalities. He was most recently featured on the sixth series of The X Factor

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
